events.name: PyLadies August Meetup
events.description: Our July meetup was a huge success, but not everything was perfect and  we got very valuable feedback from our attendees. We will incorporate that feedback into our slides and repeat the meetup once more in August. We had many people on the waiting list and some couldn't make it last minute - this is your second chance!! Please only fill out this form if you really intend to come. We have only 40 seats available and we want to reach as many women as possible. A pros pros women: This is a PyLadies workshop and obviously it is aimed to mentor female developers in Singapore. We are in the early stages of building up this community and the demand seems to be huge, therefore, due to limited slots available, we cannot accept RSVPs from male developers, YET.
events.location: PayPal office at 5 Temasek Boulevard, Level 7, Suntec Tower 5, Singapore 038985

events.name: Data Mining With R (Workshop III)
events.description:
Hello everyone, the upcoming Data Mining with R workshop will be talking about clustering with iterative process.Clustering can be considered the most important unsupervised learning problem. The goal of clustering is to determine the intrinsic grouping in a set of unlabeled data. In this talk, Teck Por will be showing three clustering algorithms with iterative process: K-means clustering, EM clustering and kernel K-means clustering. After the introduction of the 3 popular clustering algorithms, he will also share his experience on fine tuning the parameters to address real problems, such as determine the number of clusters. Of course, in the end, the code walkthrough session will also give you an idea of how to apply these algorithms with R. 





The presentation slides and the R code can be downloaded from https://github.com/singator/rugs/tree/master/data_mining/clustering
events.location: Microsoft Auditorium (Singapore), One Marina Boulevard, Level 21 Auditorium, Singapore 018989

events.name: Meteor August Meetup
events.description:
Hello everyone, It's time for our August MeteorSG meetup! This is kind of a placeholder for now as some people are starting to ask when the next meetup is :-) *** Call for speakers! Message us on our facebook page (link below) or comment below if you have anything interesting to present! ***  Doors open from 7pm and we will start the talks promptly at 7.30pm.  ==================================== Meetup Agenda: #1 - Creating a Meteor application for Android APK using phonegap - Albert Tirtohadi #2 - Meteor Schema and Autoform - Dan Tran #3 - Meteor Clinic: - If anyone has any specific Meteor questions or problems they can ask the community here to see if someone can help. So please make a note of any questions/problems you have! Remember - there is no such thing as a 'stupid question' (</a>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/No_such_thing_as_a_stupid_question) #4 Housekeeping - Reminder that we have the following communication channels:  Facebook: <a href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/meteorjssg/">https://www.facebook.com/groups/meteorjssg Slack: </a>https://meteorsg.slack.com Website & Blog: <a href="http://singapore.meteor.com/">http://singapore.meteor.com/ #5 Socializing / Networking  ==================================== We do also try to allocate some time for anyone to share about any Meteor projects they are working on or would like to talk about. We should have a projector at the venue so please just bring a laptop if you would like to do this. Some talks may be interactive so if you wish to follow along then please bring along a laptop (preferably with Meteor and MongoDB pre-installed). Location: Please note we may be at the new space which is at #02-01, in Bk71 Organizers: Rick Behl, Old school programmer, hacker and entrepreneur 


Venue sponsor: Plug-In@Blk71: http://www2.blk71.com  Please contact us to sign up to our newsletter for future events...

events.name: First Dinner Gathering
events.description: Let's meetup for the first time! Feel free to suggest a different timing or place if you really want to come but can't make it due to busy schedules!
events.location: Everything with Fries (Orchard Central), 181 Orchard Road, #01-24/25, Singapore
